recipes.description: Is it a bird, is it a plane, is it a superhero? Detect specific objects in an image.

recipes.description: Segment an image into foreground and background and remove the background.

recipes.description: Bring color to black & white or historical photography.
recipes.name: Image colorization

recipes.description: Increase the dimensions of an image to higher resolution.

recipes.description: Remove unwanted objects (including dust / scratches) from an image.
recipes.name: Remove unwanted objects

recipes.description: Recreate an image to mimic the style of another.
recipes.name: Style transfer

recipes.description: Create a 3-dimensional representation of a 2-dimensional image.
recipes.name: 2D to 3D
